# API REST UPLOAD IMAGES B64

> GET ALL
```jsonc
// http://localhost:8000/api/v1/images [GET]
```


> SAVE
```jsonc
// http://localhost:8000/api/v1/images [POST]
{
    "format": "image/png",
    "name": "image.png",
    "image_b64": ""
}
```

> REMOVE
```jsonc
// http://localhost:8000/api/v1/images/9NGCgSQCM4JPlxJmsVZWj___test.png [DELETE]
```
